I found this in the log:
ava.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 6, Size: 5
at java.util.ArrayList.RangeCheck(ArrayList.java:547)

at

sorry, no idea how it got there. 
I'm running
eclipse.buildId=I20050627-1435
java.version=1.5.0
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86

This looks like a side effect of the HCR manager using the same list object 
that is cached in a thread to iterate over frames. If the thread object 
changes its frames while the HCR manager is iterating over it, there could be 
a problem.
